Work & Education

Work History

Apollo

React-Native Developer
Jun 2019 - Present

I worked on a mobile application which seeks to digitize the social status of New York's nightclubs. The application is built in React-Native and Expo, and the backend uses Google Firebase. I worked on a team with 2 other developers, and my main responsibility is configuring the application for a standalone Android build. We would meet bi-weekly with the design committee and the social media team to make sure all teams are aware of the other teams' progress, as well as plan the next steps in the developement process.

Fullstack Academy

Full Stack Developer
Feb 2019 - May 2019

I worked in several four man teams to build full stack applications like City Flocks and Books-a-Lot. We employed the Agile methodology to plan work sprints and maintain consistent workflow, while coding was done mostly using pair programming to maintain clean and efficient code. My main responsibility in these teams was the development of the server-side code and setting up the deployment of the applications.

Benihana Inc

Takeout Manager
Oct 2018 - Jan 2019

I was responsible for relaying and sending the to-go orders of an inner city restaurant that served at least on average 500 delivery orders a day. I received the orders using multiple ordering applications such as GrubHub and Postmates, and managed the workflow between kitchen and delivery staff to ensure customers recived their orders in a timely manner.

Benihana Inc

Prep Cook
Jun 2018 - Jan 2019

I had to prepare multiple food items for a company that served at least 300 dine-in daily orders. My responsibility was to prepare ingredients and ensure proper quality for use by teppanyaki and sushi chefs, as well as cook side dishes such as rice, soup, and salad. I cycled through multiple positions such as dishwashing, delivery, and bussing to suit the ever-changing demands of the company.
